alert.note: Alert for Hale; Lamb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 2:00PM CDT until October 04 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hale County in northwestern Texas... Southeastern Lamb County in northwestern Texas... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 200 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Spade, or 6 miles east of Littlefield, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Plainview, Littlefield, Hale Center, Petersburg, Cotton Center, Fieldton, Spade, Halfway, and Edmonson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
